headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SYLVAN, ELEANOR GLASBERG

snippet: SYLVAN--Eleanor Glasberg, 85, of Boca Raton, FL and Woodmere, NY, passed away on May 1, 2016. Loving mother of Bonnie Fuchs, Lisa Glasberg and Andrea Kantor and grandmother of Jennifer Kantor and Casey Fuchs. Despite battling the affects of Alzheimer's, we're sure she's now showing everyone in heaven how to do the New York Times Crossword Puzzle in ink and to play a fierce game of Bridge. A graduate of Adelphi University, Eleanor was also passionate about teaching. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to the Alzheimer's Association. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SYLVAN--Eleanor Glasberg, 85, of Boca Raton, FL and Woodmere, NY, passed away on May 1, 2016. Loving mother of Bonnie Fuchs, Lisa Glasberg and Andrea Kantor and grandmother of Jennifer Kantor and Casey Fuchs. Despite battling the affects of Alzheimer's, we're sure she's now showing everyone in heaven how to do the New York Times Crossword Puzzle in ink and to play a fierce game of Bridge. A graduate of Adelphi University, Eleanor was also passionate about teaching. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to the Alzheimer's Association. 1/3
